revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=UniElec |model=U7621-06 |price=42 |est_release_date=10/2017 |is_manuf=No |type=wireless embedded board |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621A |cpu1_cspeed=880 MHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805D |ram1=256 MiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR3 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0, mSATA, |expansion_minipci_num=3 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=SIM Card slot, TF Card slot, |stock_boot=U-Boot;v4.0;Breed; |stock_os=Linux;3.14.48;PandoraBox v14; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, PandoraBox, Padavan (unofficially), |oui=7C:3E:9D |oui_eth=7C:3E:9D }} {{TagLine|MTK Network Process Platform}} :[http://www.unielecinc.com/q/news/cn/h/pyrEjfTmYf Product page]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/10/13/unielec-u7621-06-mediatek-mt7621-router-supports-openwrt-padavan-and-pandorabox-firmware/ On CNXSoftware] :Notes use of [https://breed.hackpascal.net/ Breed bootloader] :2x mPCIe, 1x mPCIe/mSATA (USB 2.0), 1x SATA 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 ports
*[https://www.aliexpress.com/item/MTK-MT7621-Enterprise-Router-Firewall-Gateway-LTE-4G-WIFI-PCBA-ODM-OEM-U7621-06/32819923460.html On AliExpress] :Notes RAM as variable (256 MiB standard, 512 MiB upgraded) :States OpenWrt, Padavan, and PandoraBox support, though, possibly unofficial? :The price of the unit ranged from 41.90 (bare) to 124.80 USD (enclosed with MT7615 modules)
*[https://patchwork.ozlabs.org/patch/834235/ Patch to LEDE adding support w/ commentary (mailing list)] :MAC address duplication - 7c:3e:9d:1d:7a:2c
*[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=842593 On 4pda forums] (bootlog)
